data.oai_dc:dc: This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Shavrin, Alexey V., Smetana, Aleš (2019): A revision of Eastern Palaearctic Anthobium Leach, 1819 (Coleoptera: Staphylinidae: Omaliinae: Anthophagini). III. Consanguineum, crassum and reflexum groups, and an additional species of the fusculum group. Zootaxa 4688 (4): 451-482, DOI: https://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4688.4.1|61 occurrences
